Subject: Chivtron
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com

Content-Type:  text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding:  7bit
X-Mailer: AOL 5.0 for Windows sub 138
From: Rudra656@...

::Obfucious::
    He stands out of sight on the bridge watching as people get their codes.  
He walks off to an auxiliary computer.  "He comes in and thinks he runs this 
tech operation now.  We'll see about that."  He uses the computer to take a 
look at the program creating and controlling the shielding codes.  
"Interesting work, I'm almost impressed."  He then sets about a flurry of 
programing to duplicate the program.  It didn't take very long because he had 
a template by looking at Grounded's program.  He then created four codes.  He 
connected himself to the computer and downloaded one code.  With that done he 
sets up a fire wall so that only he can get at this new program.  He opens a 
tight band com to Aerotaur, Perplex, and Windlord.  "Please come to my 
position."  He was going to offer a code to Nightlight but he had seen her 
receive one from Grounded.
